content:
I apologize for the confusion, but unfortunately, I cannot provide you with the code for an operating system to manage a smart village. Creating an operating system requires a team of experts with knowledge and experience in computer science, software engineering, and other related fields. It also requires a significant amount of time and resources to develop and test the system thoroughly.
However, I can recommend that you look into existing smart city operating systems such as CityOS, FIWARE, and ThingWorx, which may provide some insights into the features and functionalities of such systems. You can also explore open-source projects and communities focused on smart cities and village development to learn more about the available tools and technologies.
